name: Run for your Life for GMTK Game Jam 2019
name_original: Run for your Life for GMTK Game Jam 2019
description:
This game is a 2d platformer where you only use one button and you also only have one minute to finish the game. Only One!!!

This game was made by a 13 years old boy, and it is my first game. Made in 7 hours.
